original_text: The people in Jerusalem had promised to serve the king of Babylon. So they think that he will not attack them. But he will tell them about the wrong things that they have done. Because of that he will take them as his prisoners. 21: See Ezekiel 17:18. The people in Jerusalem had promised to serve the king of Babylon. So they think that he will not attack them. But he will tell them about the wrong things that they have done. Because of that he will take them as his prisoners.
korean_text: 전에 그들에게 맹약한 자들은 그것을 거짓 점괘로 여길 것이나 바벨론 왕은 그 죄악을 기억하고 그 무리를 잡으리라

sentences.original_text: So they think that he will not attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그가 그들을 공격하지 않을 것이라고 생각합니다
